thread.title: Minnesota Sinfonia Offers Free Admission Orchestra Concerts in Minneapolis and Saint Paul
thread.title_full: Minnesota Sinfonia Offers Free Admission Orchestra Concerts in Minneapolis and Saint Paul - PR.com

author: PR.com
title: Minnesota Sinfonia Offers Free Admission Orchestra Concerts in Minneapolis and Saint Paul
text:
Minnesota Sinfonia Offers Free Admission Orchestra Concerts in Minneapolis and Saint Paul
Minneapolis, MN, September 04, 2015 --( PR.com )-- The Minnesota Sinfonia is please to announce its upcoming season of five programs to take place in the Twin Cities from October 2015 until March 2016. All of the Sinfoniaâ€™s concerts are free admission and children are welcome.
This years soloists include new faces and the return of audience favorites. The holiday concert features the senior division winner of the 2015 Young Artist Competition. The season comes to a close with performances featuring Itamar Zorman, the winner of the prestigious International Tchaikovsky competition.
Along with some of the great orchestral repertoire, the Sinfonia is excited to continue featuring new works by Minnesota based composers with the support of the McKnight Foundation.
2015-2016 Winter Concert Series Schedule
Romance-Russian Style featuring Dmitry Kousov, cello
Oct 9 (Fri) 7 p.m. | Metropolitan State University, 700 E. 7th St, St. Paul
Oct 11 (Sun) 2 p.m. | Basilica of Saint Mary, 88 North 17th Street, Minneapolis
Happy Holidays featuring Arjun Ganguly, viola
Nov 27 (Fri) 7 p.m. | First Covenant Church, 1280 Arcade Street, St. Paul
Nov 28 (Sat) 2 p.m. | Basilica of Saint Mary, 88 North 17th Street, Minneapolis
The Magic of Youth featuring Loren Fishman, piano
Jan 15 (Fri) 7 p.m. | Roseville Lutheran Church, 1215 Roselawn Avenue West, Roseville
Jan 16 (Sat) 2 p.m. | Basilica of St Mary, 88 North 17th Street, Minneapolis
Jan 17 (Sun) 3 p.m. | Paramount Theatre and Visual Arts Center, 913 West St. Germain St., St Cloud
Bohemian Touch featuring Eric Silberger, violin
Feb 5 (Fri) 7 p.m. | Johnson High School, 1349 Arcade Street, St. Paul
Feb 6 (Sat) 2 p.m. | Basilica of St Mary, 88 North 17th Street, Minneapolis
Father and Son featuring Itamar Zorman, violin
Mar 4 (Fri) 7 p.m. | Johnson High School, 1349 Arcade Street, St. Paul
Mar 5 (Sat) 2 p.m. | Basilica of St Mary, 88 North 17th Street, Minneapolis
For more information about the Minnesota Sinfonia or upcoming concerts visit www.mnsinfonia.org or call 612-871-1701.
